s4162: Two, minister Wu came, plotted to attack Chu.
s4168: Seventeen, restored Zhao Wu's fields. Invaded Cai.
s4184: Eighteen, seized Zheng Duke Cheng, attacked Zheng. Qin attacked us.
s4186: Nine, rescued Zheng. Winter, made alliance with Jin.
s4192: Three, made alliance with Chu. Duke went to Jin, duke seized and attacked us.
s4198: Ten, duke went to Jin for funeral, concealed it.
s4199: First year of Duke Ling of Qi (Huan)
s4208: Four, Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4216: First year of Duke Li of Jin (Shou Man)
s4217: Twenty-four, allied with Jin duke across river, returned and broke alliance.
s4246: Thirteen, assembled with Jin to attack Qin.
s4248: Three, attacked Qin to Jing, defeated them, captured their general Cheng Chai.
s4249: Twenty-six, Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4251: Eleven, Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4255: Seventeen, Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4256: Seven, Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4271: First year of Duke Cheng of Cao (Fu Chu)
s4278: Fifteen, began communicating with Wu, assembled at Zhong Li.
s4280: Five, three Xi slandered Bo Zong, assassinated him, Bo Zong was fond of direct remonstrance.
s4281: First year of Duke Jing of Qin
s4282: Fifteen, Xu feared Zheng, requested to move to Ye.
s4283: Thirteen, Hua Yuan fled to Jin, then returned.
s4284: First year of Duke Xian of Wei (Kan)
s4287: Two, Jin seized our duke and took him back.
s4290: Ten, assembled with Lu at Zhong Li.
s4294: Sixteen, Xuan Bo informed Jin, wished to kill Ji Wen Zi, Wen Zi escaped using righteousness.
s4296: Six, defeated Chu at Yan Ling.
s4298: Sixteen, rescued Zheng, unfavorable. Zi Fan drunk, army defeated, assassinated Zi Fan and returned.
s4299: First year of Duke Ping of Song (Cheng)
s4304: Ten, broke Jin alliance with Chu, Jin attacked us, Chu came to rescue.
s4328: Eight, Luan Shu and Zhong Xing Yan assassinated Duke Li, established Duke Xiang's great-grandson as Duke Dao.
s4330: Eighteen, made Yu Shi attack Song's Peng Cheng.
s4331: Three, Chu attacked Peng Cheng, enfeoffed Yu Shi.
s4337: First year of Duke Wu of Yan
s4342: First year of Duke Xiang of Lu (Wu), besieged Song's Peng Cheng.
s4343: Ten, Jin attacked us, sent crown prince Guang as hostage to Jin.
s4344: First year of Duke Dao of Jin, besieged Song's Peng Cheng.
s4347: Four, Chu invaded us, took Quan Qiu. Jin executed Yu Shi, returned Peng Cheng to us.
